Sentencas: Enhancing the power generation efficiency, which is the main advantage of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), can have valuable benefits to introduce SOFC systems into business and industrial markets of Japan, where power demands are higher than thermal demands.
Titulo: Examination of a high-efficiency solid oxide fuel cell system that reuses exhaust gas

Sentencas: In this study, we examined a high-efficiency SOFC system with an off-gas regenerating technique.
Titulo: Examination of a high-efficiency solid oxide fuel cell system that reuses exhaust gas

Sentencas: A two-stage SOFC stack configuration was employed.
Titulo: Examination of a high-efficiency solid oxide fuel cell system that reuses exhaust gas

Sentencas: For off-gas regeneration, we used a CO2 absorber and a H2O condenser.
Titulo: Examination of a high-efficiency solid oxide fuel cell system that reuses exhaust gas

Sentencas: A total of 92.0% of the fuel was successfully used with an electrical efficiency of 77.8% (DC, LHV).
Titulo: Examination of a high-efficiency solid oxide fuel cell system that reuses exhaust gas

Sentencas: However, there existed the heat loss from the fuel cell system due to the thermal insulation performance.
Titulo: Examination of a high-efficiency solid oxide fuel cell system that reuses exhaust gas

Sentencas: To compensate the heat loss, additional electric heaters were used to keep temperatures high, therefore heat sustainability remained an issue.
Titulo: Examination of a high-efficiency solid oxide fuel cell system that reuses exhaust gas
